name: PhantomMare
description:
PhantomMARE!

Your house has been sold and a trio of grannies are moving in on your property! Can you scare them before they finish moving all of their furniture in?! Once all their furniture is in, they will feel right and home and you'll be out of space!

Scare them off using sound (V key) possession of their furniture (Z key to possess, X to drop) before they get comfy! Be careful, some can only be scared from in front, some only with sounds, and some only with possessed objects!

There is no win/loss screen. You win if you can scare all the grannies (They will display ! and stop moving) before they move in all 9 pieces of furniture.

Controls : Arrow keys to move. Z to possess furniture when prompted, X to drop possessed items, V to make sounds.
